snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 49: Sonic 2099
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic 2099
Credit: TGF Team
Release Date: Summer 2002

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

(Includes both TGF & Team X version)
Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Intro
00:54 - Menu
01:10 - Launch Base Dam
03:23 - Cutscene 1
04:20 - Boss 1
04:35 - Cutscene 2
05:30 - Sky Sanctuary 2
08:37 - Cutscene 3
09:12 - Boss 2
10:25 - Cutscene 4
10:48 - Emerald Valley
13:48 - Cutscene 5
15:47 - Ice Cap 2
19:08 - Cutscene 6
19:30 - Boss 3
20:05 - Cutscene 7,8
21:53 - Eggman's Base
27:49 - Cutscene 9
28:17 - The Dead-Zone (Final Boss)
29:42 - Ending
29:53 - Credits
30:25 - Level Select & ??? Zone

NOTES: This is probably one of the more better games by "TGF/Team X"
Pretty good music, has a story to tell.
Physics ain't half bad but can get stuck in walls sometimes.
Super Mode is readily available for the most part.
Decent level design for it's time.
Good sprites, for an old game this is a good recommendation to try out.

(MUSIC)

Ice Cap Zone - https://www.vgmusic.com/music/console/sega/genesis/IceCapLive2.mid

Emerald Valley Zone - https://www.vgmusic.com/music/console/sega/dreamcast/SA2_SonicTheme.mid

(PASSWORDS)

Crabfeet
